project.description: build docker image for web UI that is working for the package manage service.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash
GIT_EMAIL="tommylike@gmail.com" GIT_VERSION="v0" TIME_VERSION="1" IMAGE_VERSION="v0.0.1" set -e echo $WEB_SRC_URL
if hash git 2>/dev/null; then GIT_VERSION=$(git rev-parse HEAD) fi TIME_VERSION=$(date +%s)
IMAGE_VERSION=$GIT_VERSION.$TIME_VERSION
if [ ! -d "packageship" ]; then echo "Download clode failed." exit fi
cd web-ui
echo "begin to docker build."
if hash docker 2>/dev/null; then docker login -u cn-north-4@$DOCKER_USER -p $DOCKER_PASS swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com docker build -t swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/openeuler/pkgmanageweb:$IMAGE_VERSION . docker push swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/openeuler/pkgmanageweb:$IMAGE_VERSION docker rmi swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/openeuler/pkgmanageweb:$IMAGE_VERSION else echo "docker is not installed." fi
echo "begin to modify image version to github."
if [ -d "infra-openeuler" ]; then echo "infra-exist, remove it." rm -rf ./infra-openeuler fi
if hash git 2>/dev/null; then git config --global user.email $GIT_EMAIL git config --global user.name $GIT_USER git clone https://$GIT_USER:$GIT_PASS@github.com/opensourceways/infra-openeuler cd infra-openeuler/applications/package-manage/release else echo "git is not existing." fi
if hash kustomize 2>/dev/null; then kustomize edit set image opensourceway/pkgmanageweb=swr.cn-north-4.myhuaweicloud.com/opensourceway/openeuler/pkgmanageweb:$IMAGE_VERSION else echo "use replace to set image." fi
if hash git 2>/dev/null; then git add . git commit -am "update image to $IMAGE_VERSION" git push origin --all else echo "git is not existing." fi
